ValidationRule.description: when users select the HNBF Hold Out checkbox they must supply an expiration date unless the permanent holdout description is Strategic Account Team
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")), HNBF_Hold_Out__c = true, ISPICKVAL( HNBF_Permanent_Hold_Out_Description__c,''), ISNULL( HNBF_Hold_Out_Expiration__c), NOT ISPICKVAL(Permanent_Hold_Out_Description__c, "Strategic Account Team") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: **** You are required to set the HNBF Hold out Expiration date when checking the HNBF Hold out checkbox****
